moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Fire Lord Ozai
characters.description: father of Prince Zuko and Princess Azula, evil dude, wants to rule the world

moves.name: Fire Dragon
moves.description: Fire Lord Ozai attacks with a dragon of flames

moves.name: Molten Throne
moves.description: Fire Lord Ozai sits atop a floating throne that drips molten lava on his opponent

moves.name: Blind Rage
moves.description: Fire Lord Ozai expresses his distaste for various things, lashing out at his opponent.

moves.name: Heat Wave
moves.description: Fire Lord Ozai radiates the heat of a sun for a moment, burning his opponent

new moves.name: Fire Breath
new moves.description: Aang harnesses his inner dragon, unleashing a breath of fire
